effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.2 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 596,235.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 11,136 for 15 sec.

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 93,982 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
